remarks: The product of two numbers apart from zero is apart from zero. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 23-Feb-2020.)
statement:
mulap0d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulap0d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulap0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A # 0 ) $.
mulap0d.4 $e |- ( ph -> B # 0 ) $.
mulap0d $p |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) # 0 ) $.
